headline: Mohawk to Report Q1 Earnings: What's in the Cards for the Stock?
summary: MHK's first-quarter 2025 results are likely to reflect a declining sales trend due to a softer residential market. That said, restructuring actions and cost-saving efforts bode well.

headline: Earnings To Watch: Mohawk Industries (MHK) Reports Q1 Results Tomorrow
summary: Flooring manufacturer Mohawk Industries (NYSE:MHK) will be reporting results tomorrow afternoon. Here’s what to expect.
